14112.content:
*NOTE: In this story, Vent and Aile are normal twins living alone with their own house. They have never met Giro, or Model X.*
Vent held his stomach as it growled loudly. He had just been hanging out with his friends, and the Mexican food that they ate gave him the worst gas. He returned to his home and went to his bedroom to see his sister, Aile, was sleeping on his bed, and his stuff was all over the floor. He figured that she was snooping around and when she heard him come back, she pretended to go to sleep on his bed. She always liked to do that, Vent thought as his stomach gurgled again. Then he got an idea. "Hmm, why is my stuff all over the floor and my sister is on my bed?" he said mockingly, "I think I'll just sit down and think." As he said that, Vent sat down on Aile's face. "Mm!" Aile tried to say, but her voice was muffled by Vent's butt. "Man, I really need to fart," he said as he ripped a long one. PPRRAAPPTT! Aile coughed and gagged under her brother's butt. "It's getting hot in here," Vent said again as he quickly stood up and took off his pants and underwear. "Vent, please, I'm sorry," Aile pleaded. "Well, I'll forgive you," Vent said as Aile smiled, "but you still need to be taught a lesson!" Vent quickly stuffed his butt on Aile's open mouth and farted a long, bubbly one right in her mouth. BLLLUUBBBbbbbblbllLLULUULUUullbbbbbpptpltttLLLLUUUPPTTTTPT!
Little brown pieces entered Aile's mouth as her senses was not only assaulted by the smell, but also by the taste. Aile couldn't take it anymore as she fainted. "Well that was quick," Vent said as he farted a smelly little poot for when she woke up. Vent then...

Though, after a while, you don't know what happened but Ashe turned cold. She would always steal the treasure away from you and claim that she found it by herself and you wouldn't get paid. Due to this you stopped working together and decided to do missions solo. Though there were times where, after you completed a mission and obtained treasure, Ashe would claim you took what she was planning to steal first. And she'd even force you down and fart on you until you gave it up to her. One day, you just couldn't take it anymore and decided you had to get her back for what she did. 15211.content: Lan was having lunch, and of course his mom made him his favorite food, Curry. Lan loved eating it so much that, despite his plate being huge, he had asked his mom for seconds and thirds... and maybe one or two fourths. After he ate the curry, his belly grew to a balloon size and gave off a few warning gurgles, though he ignored them. He went up to his bedroom, sat on his computer chair and took out his PET. Soon, Mayl came over to his house to see him and went up the stairs to his room. "Hey, Lan! Wanna have a NET battle?" She asked him. Lan got an idea. "Sure, Mayl, but how about we make it more interesting with a bet?" "Why not? What kind of bet, Lan?" "Loser does whatever the winner wants." Lan suggested. "Alright then. Let's do it." The two jacked in and Megaman.EXE and Roll.EXE began doing battle. In the end, Megaman.EXE won the battle and Lan cheered. Mayl sighed. "I should've expected that... Well you won, so what do you want me to do?"

1531.title: Geo

choices: The two have a makeshift date at the spring, trying to keep in their gas.
Sonia ask to kiss Geo's ass.
15311.content:
Geo and Sonia were off on a 4 week camping trip. Sharing baths in the nearby spring, and sharing the same tent. Of course the two slept in separate sleeping bags. They were alone as Mega and Lyra were off helping with the reconstruction of Planet AM.

It was a fun time, until Sonia got gassy and pulled a prank on Geo by farting in his face to wake him up. After that Geo at as much gas inducing foods as possible to get at least close to as gassy as Sonia.

He did get Sonia back, by pulling the same prank that she did on her. The two have since been farting in each others faces for 7 days straight. With Geo's being small, silent, airy, and smelly, and Sonia's being large, loud, tear inducing, and smelly. The two took any chance they had to fart on the other.

However, the two have since been getting used to each others gas, and have been realizing exactly why this stinky rivalry had started; other than payback.

Geo was sitting on a log, trying to hold in his gas, while at the same time wondering how he was going to ask Sonia out. Sure he had farted on her, and vice versa, for the past 7 days; but he genuinely liked her.

At the same time, behind a tree that was behind Geo, was Sonia who was holding in her gas, and wondering how to confess to Geo and ask him out. Stinky Sonia was the superior farter, but not the superior when it came to admitting feelings. Eventually she went out, and sat next to Geo.

"Hey Geo, can I ask you something?"

Startled into almost farting, Geo quickly composed himself and answered, "Sure Sonia, but only if I can ask you something."

"If you want, if you want to take a small break from all the farting, , do you want to have a date with me?"

Geo was smiling, and had tears forming in his eyes, "Yes, I do." Geo grabbed Sonia into a hug, while she did the same. They squeezed the other, causing them to accidentally fart.

"Sorry," the two said in unison undoing the hug and blushing.
15311.title: Stinky Sonia and Gassy Geo

choices: Wanna have a fart contest, with Luna as the judge?
Wanna give Luna a dutch oven?
153111.content:
The two had a campfire, roasting marshmallows, and WERE sitting on logs. The full moon was out, and the two had the best time; even when one farted in the direction of the other.

However they were not sitting on a log, they were sitting on Luna. She was caught spying on their date, gagged, and her arms and legs were tied together. Add two 12 year olds sitting on her back with their bare butts, and farting; then it's clear that she was in hell.

"Hey Geo," Sonia said whilst farting a big one.

"Yeah Sonia?" Geo asked, while cutting his own fart.
